text: The name's Ermine, Ermine Castoro. What's it to ya?

name: Terry
text: Is this your operation? Did you build this dam?

name: Ermine Castoro
text: Why yes, it's my pride and joy. Lost a lot of good beavers buildin 'er up

name: Ermine Castoro
text: But I'll make millions now that she's up and operational

name: Terry
text: Well you didn't just lose beavers, this dam of yours destroyed my home and killed my family.

name: Terry
text: Now I have nothing to live for.

name: Ermine Castoro
text: It's just business kid, don't take it too personal. Now get outta my face.

name: Terry
text: Ermine Castoro, my name is Terry the Turtle. You killed my family. Prepare to die!
